## Subscription.subscribe() method

Creates new child subscription with given subscriber and/or transducer and optional subscription ID.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
subscribe<C>(sub: Partial<ISubscriber<C>>, xform: Transducer<B, C>, id?: string): Subscription<B, C>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  sub | <code>Partial&lt;ISubscriber&lt;C&gt;&gt;</code> |  |
|  xform | <code>Transducer&lt;B, C&gt;</code> |  |
|  id | <code>string</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Subscription<B, C>`
